price: 54. C’est ainsi qu’il manipula son peuple qui alors lui obéit. Car c’était un peuple de pervers.
arabic: فَٱسۡتَخَفَّ قَوۡمَهُۥ فَأَطَاعُوهُۚ إِنَّهُمۡ كَانُواْ قَوۡمٗا فَٰسِقِينَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: fa-is'takhaffa qawmahu fa-aṭāʿūhu innahum kānū qawman fāsiqīna
